description:
- Fixed the song so the two choruses are separate. First and second endings didn't work.
- Added some vibrato in places where it was missing on the rhythm guitar track
title: Have A Cigar

description:
- Renamed tracks.
- Vocal track: Added lyrics and corrected pitches and rhythm
- Rhythm guitar: All rhythm parts put into one track. Fixed some rhythm issues and corrected some notes
- Lead guitar: All fills put into one track, as well as the solo and a few rhythm parts that are played with it.
- Added drums, piano, and synth. They aren't completely accurate, but it should be pretty close to what's played in the song.
title: Have A Cigar
